column1: I feel like there's a a competition between Coronavirus and WW3 for the big world ending event this year

"you can't be mad and blame china for the Corona virus. That's racist."

>meanwhile in china

"Dude, what if we eat this rotten egg that's been around for a hundred years"
Coronavirus, a thrifty substitute for salt if you're aggravating your enemies wounds but didn't come prepared
